exercises.name: Around the World
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells at your sides, bring them up and around your head in a circular motion, then lower them back down.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Overhead Press
exercises.description: Press the dumbbells overhead from shoulder height until your arms are fully extended, then lower back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Overhead Press Single Arm
exercises.description: Press one dumbbell overhead while keeping the other arm at your side, then switch arms after the desired repetitions.

exercises.name: Barbell Overhead Press
exercises.description: Grip the barbell at shoulder width, press it overhead until arms are locked, then lower back to shoulder level.

exercises.name: Barbell Behind the Neck Press
exercises.description: Lower the barbell behind your head to shoulder level, then press it back up overhead.

exercises.name: Barbell Upright Row
exercises.description: Hold the barbell at thigh level with an overhand grip, pull it up towards your chin while keeping elbows high.

exercises.name: EZ Bar Upright Row
exercises.description: Using an EZ curl bar, pull it up towards your chin while keeping elbows higher than wrists.

exercises.name: Cable Upright Row
exercises.description: Use a cable machine with a straight bar attachment and pull the bar towards your chin, keeping elbows high.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Upright Row
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells at your thighs and pull them up toward your chin, leading with your elbows.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.description: Raise dumbbells out to the sides until shoulder level, then slowly lower back to start.

exercises.name: Barbell Front Raise
exercises.description: Hold a barbell in front of you and raise it to shoulder height, then lower it back down.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Front Raise
exercises.description: Lift dumbbells in front of you to shoulder height, then lower back down.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bent Over Reverse Fly
exercises.description: Hinge at the hips, raise dumbbells out to the sides while keeping a slight bend in your elbows.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Incline Prone Reverse Fly
exercises.description: Lie face down on an incline bench and raise dumbbells out to the sides.

exercises.name: Cable Face Pull
exercises.description: Using a rope attachment, pull the cable towards your face while keeping elbows high.

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a flat bench, grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width, lower it to your chest, then push it back up.

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press Close Grip
exercises.description: Perform a bench press with hands closer together to emphasize triceps activation.

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press Wide Grip
exercises.description: Use a wider grip on the barbell bench press to target the chest more.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a bench and press dumbbells up from chest level until arms are fully extended.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand. Press the dumbbells above your chest by extending your arms. Slowly lower the weights until they are at chest level, then press them back up.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Fly
exercises.description: Lie flat on a bench holding dumbbells above your chest with a slight bend in your elbows. Lower the dumbbells out to the sides until you feel a stretch in your chest. Bring them back to the starting position in a controlled motion.

exercises.name: Decline Dumbbell Fly
exercises.description: Lie on a decline bench with a dumbbell in each hand. Extend your arms above your chest, then slowly lower the dumbbells to the sides while keeping a slight bend in your elbows. Bring them back together in a controlled motion.

exercises.name: Medium Cable Fly
exercises.description: Stand in the middle of a cable machine with the pulleys set at shoulder height. Grab the handles and bring your hands together in front of you, then slowly return to the starting position.

exercises.name: High Cable Fly
exercises.description: Set the cable pulleys to the highest setting. With a handle in each hand, step forward and bring your hands down and together in front of you. Slowly return to the start.

exercises.name: Low Cable Fly
exercises.description: Set the cable pulleys to the lowest setting. Hold a handle in each hand and bring your hands up and together in front of you. Slowly return to the start.

exercises.name: Chest Press Machine
exercises.description: Sit on the chest press machine with your back flat against the pad. Push the handles forward until your arms are extended, then slowly return to the start.

exercises.name: Chest Fly Machine
exercises.description: Sit at the chest fly machine and grip the handles. Bring your hands together in front of you in a controlled motion, then slowly return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Push-Up Close Grip
exercises.description: Get into a push-up position with your hands placed closer than shoulder-width apart. Lower your chest to just above the floor, then push back up.

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.description: Grip parallel bars and lift yourself up. Lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows, then push yourself back up.

exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.description: With your legs extended back, place your hands below your shoulders, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Lower your chest to just above the floor, then push back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Standing Dumbbell Wrist Curl
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing upward. Rest your forearms on a bench or your thighs. Curl your wrists upward, then slowly lower them back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Behind Back Barbell Wrist Curl
exercises.description: Hold a barbell behind your back with palms facing away. Curl your wrists upward, then slowly lower back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Preacher Dumbbell Wrist Curl
exercises.description: Sit at a preacher bench with a dumbbell in one hand. Rest your arm on the bench and curl your wrist upward, then lower it back down.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.description: Lie on your side with legs extended. Support your upper body with your elbow and hold the position, engaging your obliques.

exercises.name: Hanging Windshield Wipers
exercises.description: Hang from a bar and lift your legs. Rotate them side to side in a controlled motion, engaging your core and obliques.

exercises.name: Standing Dumbbell Side Bend
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell in one hand and bend sideways at the waist. Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.

exercises.name: Roman Chair Side Bend
exercises.description: Position yourself sideways on a Roman chair. Lower your torso and then engage your obliques to lift back up.

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.description: Place a barbell on your upper back. Squat down by bending your knees and lowering your hips, then push back up to standing.

exercises.name: Barbell Front Squat
exercises.description: Hold a barbell across your front shoulders. Squat down by bending your knees and lowering your hips, then push back up.

exercises.name: Barbell Lunge
exercises.description: Hold a barbell on your upper back. Step forward into a lunge, lower your back knee, then push back to standing.

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level. Squat down by bending your knees and lowering your hips, then push back up.

exercises.name: Goblet Lunge
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level. Step forward into a lunge, lower your back knee, then push back to standing.

exercises.name: Goblet Bulgarian Lunge
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level. Place one foot behind you on a bench and lunge forward with the front leg.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squat
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower your hips back and down as if sitting in a chair. Keep your chest up and knees aligned with your toes. Push through your heels to return to standing.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lunge
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at about a 90-degree angle. Push through your front heel to return to the starting position. Repeat on the other leg.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Walking Lunges
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells at your sides and step forward into a lunge. Push up and bring the back leg forward into the next lunge. Continue stepping forward while alternating legs.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Step Up
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand and stand in front of a bench. Step up onto the bench with one foot, pressing through the heel. Bring the other foot up, then step down one foot at a time.

exercises.name: Step Up
exercises.description: Step up onto a bench or elevated platform with one foot, pushing through your heel to stand. Bring the other foot up, then step down one foot at a time. Repeat on the other leg.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Sit in the leg press machine and place your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. Push the platform away by extending your knees, then slowly return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.description: Sit on the leg extension machine with your knees bent. Extend your legs until they are straight, then slowly lower them back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Lunge
exercises.description: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at about a 90-degree angle. Push through your front heel to return to the starting position. Repeat on the other leg.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Bulgarian Lunge
exercises.description: Stand a few feet in front of a bench. Place one foot behind you on the bench and lower into a lunge position. Push through your front foot to return to the starting position. Repeat on the other leg.

exercises.name: Run
exercises.description: Run at a steady pace for cardiovascular endurance and overall fitness.

exercises.name: Run on Treadmill
exercises.description: Run on a treadmill at a steady pace, adjusting speed and incline as needed.

exercises.name: Bicycle Machine
exercises.description: Use a stationary bicycle machine to improve cardiovascular endurance and lower body strength.

exercises.name: Cycling
exercises.description: Ride a bicycle outdoors or on a stationary bike for cardiovascular endurance and leg strength.

exercises.name: Elliptical Machine
exercises.description: Use an elliptical machine to perform a low-impact cardiovascular workout while engaging the arms and legs.

exercises.name: Step Machine
exercises.description: Use a step machine to perform a stair-climbing motion for cardiovascular fitness and leg endurance.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: Jump over a rope continuously for a high-intensity cardiovascular workout.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: From a standing position, squat down, kick your legs back into a push-up position, return to squat, and jump up explosively.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Get into a push-up position and rapidly alternate driving your knees toward your chest.

exercises.name: Battling Rope
exercises.description: Hold battle ropes in each hand and move them in waves, slams, or circles for an intense cardio workout.

exercises.name: Walk on Treadmill
exercises.description: Walk on a treadmill at a moderate pace, adjusting speed and incline as needed.

exercises.name: Walk
exercises.description: Maintain an upright posture and walk at a steady pace, ensuring proper heel-to-toe movement and arm swing.

exercises.name: Reverse Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Hold a barbell or dumbbells with an overhand grip. Curl the weight up while keeping your elbows close to your torso. Lower back down in a controlled manner.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl to Opposite Shoulder
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell in one hand and curl it diagonally across your body toward the opposite shoulder. Lower back down and repeat.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Side Curl
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells at your sides with a neutral grip. Curl them up while keeping your arms close to your torso.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells with a supinated grip. Curl them up while keeping your elbows stationary. Lower them back down slowly.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
exercises.description: Hold dumbbells with a neutral grip. Curl them up while keeping your elbows close to your body. Lower back down in a controlled motion.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Hammer Curl
exercises.description: Sit on an incline bench and hold dumbbells with a neutral grip. Curl them up while keeping your elbows close to your body. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Preacher Curl
exercises.description: Sit at a preacher bench and hold a dumbbell with an underhand grip. Curl the dumbbell up while keeping your arm stabilized. Lower it back down.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Preacher Hammer Curl
exercises.description: Sit at a preacher bench and hold a dumbbell with a neutral grip. Curl the dumbbell up while keeping your arm stabilized. Lower it back down.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Bicep Curl
exercises.description: Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, arms fully extended. Keep your elbows close to your torso and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders. Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Lift your upper body towards your knees by engaging your core. Lower back down and repeat.

exercises.name: Situps
exercises.description: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Raise your torso toward your knees and then lower back down in a controlled manner.

exercises.name: Decline Crunches
exercises.description: Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured. Crunch up by contracting your abs, then lower back down slowly.

exercises.name: V-Ups
exercises.description: Lie flat on the floor. Simultaneously raise your legs and upper body, reaching for your toes with your hands. Lower back down with control.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lie flat on your back. Lift your legs while keeping them straight until they form a 90-degree angle with the floor. Lower them back down slowly.

exercises.name: Reverse Crunch Up
exercises.description: Lie on your back. Lift your legs and curl your hips off the ground by contracting your abs. Lower back down slowly.

exercises.name: Hanging Knee Raise
exercises.description: Hang from a pull-up bar. Raise your knees towards your chest while keeping your core engaged. Lower back down with control.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.description: Hang from a pull-up bar. Keep your legs straight and raise them until they form a 90-degree angle. Lower them back down slowly.

exercises.name: Toes to Bar
exercises.description: Hang from a pull-up bar. Lift your legs up and touch your toes to the bar. Lower them back down with control.

exercises.name: Ab Station Knee Raise
exercises.description: Use an ab station. Raise your knees towards your chest while keeping your back against the pad. Lower back down slowly.

exercises.name: Ab Station Leg Raise
exercises.description: Use an ab station. Keep your legs straight and raise them up to hip height. Lower back down in a controlled manner.

exercises.name: Ab Machine
exercises.description: Use an ab machine by selecting an appropriate weight. Crunch forward by contracting your abs, then return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Decline Situps
exercises.description: Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured. Cross your arms over your chest or place them behind your head. Engage your core and lift your torso towards your knees. Slowly lower yourself back down.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Lie face down and prop yourself up on your forearms and toes. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. Engage your core and hold this position for the desired duration.

exercises.name: Single Leg Cable Adduction
exercises.description: Attach a cable to your ankle. Stand sideways and pull your leg inward across your body while keeping your core engaged. Return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Adduction Machine
exercises.description: Sit on the machine with your legs placed against the pads. Slowly squeeze your legs together, then return to the starting position in a controlled motion.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.description: Sit on the floor with your knees bent and feet lifted. Hold a weight or clasp your hands together. Twist your torso to the left, then to the right, engaging your core.

exercises.name: Standing Dumbbell Shrugs
exercises.description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Raise your shoulders toward your ears as high as possible. Hold briefly, then slowly lower back down.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Skull Crusher
exercises.description: Lie on a bench holding dumbbells above your head. Lower them toward your forehead by bending your elbows. Extend your arms back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.description: Place one knee and hand on a bench for support. Hold a dumbbell in the other hand and pull it towards your torso, keeping your elbow close. Lower the weight back down.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: Use an abduction machine or resistance band. Push outward against resistance, engaging your outer thighs and glutes.

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.description: Lie face down with arms and legs extended. Simultaneously lift your arms, chest, and legs off the floor. Hold briefly, then lower back down.

exercises.name: Barbell Hip Thrust
exercises.description: Sit on the floor with a bench behind you and a barbell over your hips. Drive your hips upward, squeezing your glutes at the top. Lower back down.

exercises.name: Barbell Deadlift
exercises.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart and a barbell in front of you. Hinge at your hips and lower your torso while gripping the bar. Lift the bar by driving through your heels, keeping your back straight.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Push through the balls of your feet to raise your heels. Hold briefly, then lower back down.
